actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide duty-free treatment of certain entries of shoes used by Shoes For Kids, Inc., a nonprofit organization.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to: (1) provide duty-free treatment of certain entries of shoes used exclusively by a named corporation of Cleveland, Ohio; and (2) reliquidate specified entries made before enactment of this Act and make the appropriate refunds of duties.

titles.title: A bill to provide duty-free treatment of certain entries of shoes used by Shoes For Kids, Inc., a nonprofit organization.
